svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Interpersonal trust (share of people reporting that "most people can be trusted" in the World Value Survey) against
income inequality by Gini index (higher values reflect more inequality). Data from 2000 (or closest year available).
Source: Trust (World Values Survey (2014)), World Bank
